name: Golden Flower - Botanical dreams
description:
Instructions found "in-game" on the pink letter envelope, found in the bottom right corner. 

Use left click to interact and right click to cancel. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the" Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 "

Welcome to our point and click strategy game where you play as a botanical starting your very first plant shop. 

Your goal is to achieve growing the "Golden Flower" by carefully managing your plants' parameters and ambient conditions to help them thrive. 

Sell your plants by cutting them and earn money for new plants with better sale prices.

Please keep in mind that your plants may wither if you don't give them the care they need to flourish. 

We've put a lot of love into developing this game and we sincerely hope you enjoy playing it! We value any feedback you have and appreciate you taking the time to play our game. Thank you!

100% of Art and Code were made during the Game Jam time. 

Music copyright: Forest Waltz by Yasumu Provided by Lofi Girl
